name: Yaron
content:
Yaron was a Human male smuggler who operated out of the city of Doaba Guerfel on the planet Corellia during the time of the Galactic Civil War.
Yaron was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Yaron was added to the game along with the smuggling missions introduced with the "Chapter 3" update, released on September 27, 2006.
